mapper.sql: mission_id, content, type, sex, address, money, publish_id, create_time, start_time, accept_id, status, accept_time, finish_time, anonymous, to_id, record_sn, to_type
mapper.select: select a.*,b.head_img,b.birth,b.user_name,b.nick_name,b.sex as user_sex,b.country,b.invisible from tb_mission a,tb_user b where a.publish_id = b.user_id and a.status=0 and a.to_type = 0 order by money desc limit #{start},#{count}

select a.*,b.head_img,b.birth,b.user_name,b.nick_name,b.sex as user_sex,b.country,b.invisible from tb_mission a,tb_user b where a.publish_id = b.user_id and (a.publish_id = #{userId} or a.accept_id = #{userId} or (a.to_id = #{userId} and a.to_type <> 2)) and a.status <> 5 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_mission (mission_id, content, type, sex, address, money, publish_id, create_time, start_time, accept_id, status, accept_time, finish_time, anonymous, to_id, record_sn, to_type) values (#{missionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{acceptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{anonymous,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tb_mission
mission_id,
content,
type,
sex,
address,
money,
publish_id,
create_time,
start_time,
accept_id,
status,
accept_time,
finish_time,
anonymous,
to_id,
record_sn,
to_type,
#{missionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{publishId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{acceptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{anonymous,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{toId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recordSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{toType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update tb_mission
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
publish_id = #{publishId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
accept_id = #{acceptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
anonymous = #{anonymous,jdbcType=INTEGER},
to_id = #{toId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_sn = #{recordSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_type = #{toType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where mission_id = #{missionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_mission set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, publish_id = #{publishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, accept_id = #{acceptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, anonymous = #{anonymous,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_id = #{toId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_sn = #{recordSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_type = #{toType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where mission_id = #{missionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
